text: goal ussie work European football league data supplied engsoccerdata package (Curley 2016)

title: Get available countries — uss_countries
text: character vector containing names available countries.

title: Get a league-play tibble — uss_get_matches
text: Gets league-play data game, engsoccerdata, returning tibble standardised format.

title: Get a league-play tibble — uss_get_matches
text: country character scalar, specifies league. ... <data-masking> Expressions return logical value, defined terms variables .data. multiple expressions included, combined & operator. rows conditions evaluate TRUE kept.

title: Get a league-play tibble — uss_get_matches
text: tibble columns country, date, season, tier, home, visitor, goals_home, goals_visitor.

title: Get a league-play tibble — uss_get_matches
text: uss_countries() returns available choices; "england" default. function relies internal function, uss_make_matches(), parse source data.

title: Get a league-play tibble — uss_get_matches

what: Make a standard league-play tibble — uss_make_matches
title: Make a standard league-play tibble — uss_make_matches
text: Given league-play data frame engsoccer, returns tibble standardised column-names types, e.g. date Date.

title: Make a standard league-play tibble — uss_make_matches
Make a standard league-play tibble — uss_make_matches
text: data_engsoc obtained engsoccerdata. country character scalar, specifies league.

title: Make a standard league-play tibble — uss_make_matches
text: tibble columns country, date, season, tier, home, visitor, goals_home, goals_visitor.

title: Make a standard league-play tibble — uss_make_matches

what: ussie: Work with European Football League Data — ussie-package
title: ussie: Work with European Football League Data — ussie-package
text: demo package "Building Tidy Tools" workshop rstudio::conf(2022L). allows work European football league data supplied engsoccerdata package (Curley 2016).
